io.github.javaconductor.gserv
[Groovy] Class GServInstance

java.lang.Object
  io.github.javaconductor.gserv.GServInstance

@groovy.util.logging.Log4j
class GServInstance

An HTTP Server Instance. Pass a port number to the start() method to start the instance on that port.
